Package main.java.neat.core

package main.java.neat.core
  • Class
    Description
    Agent
    Represents an individual agent in the NEAT (NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies) algorithm.
    Connection
    Represents a connection between two nodes in a neural network genome.
    Genome
    Represents a genome in the NEAT (NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies) algorithm.
    Genome.GenomeVisualizationData
    Helper class for genome visualization data handling.
    Neat
    Main class implementing the NEAT algorithm workflow.
    Node
    Represents a node in a neural network genome within the NEAT algorithm.
    Node.TYPE
    Enum representing node types in the neural network.
